name: Retro world blues
description:
Horror card game set in retro wave aesthetic

Took it ~3 weeks - most of time just trying ideas and mechanics - I am learning fast prototyping

Controls:

WASD for camera movement

click to take/place a card 

F to sacrifice a card to the thing...

ToDo:

I will post tools used in this game if someone will even check this game out) 

Team of two people - me and a designer
